price: 29. Farao zei: “Als je een god anders dan mij kiest, zal ik je zeker onder de gevangenen plaatsen.”
arabic: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذۡتَ إِلَٰهًا غَيۡرِي لَأَجۡعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَسۡجُونِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla la-ini ittakhadhta ilāhan ghayrī la-ajʿalannaka mina al-masjūnīna
